org.jvnet.hudson.plugins.SSHBuilder.command:
echo unmounting any sdcard folders DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get -q -y install parted hostapd
lsblk df -h
pkill julia pkill julia pkill julia pkill julia pkill julia pkill julia
# Extract PIDs related to 'sdcard' using lsof for trys in {1..5} do echo Retry $trys for pid in $(lsof | grep sdcard | awk '{print $2}' | sort -u) do echo "Processing PID: $pid" # Perform any action on the PID, e.g., killing the process sudo kill -9 "$pid" 2>/dev/null && echo "Killed PID $pid" || echo "Failed to kill PID $pid" done
# Find all Julia processes and terminate them echo "Searching for Julia processes..."
# Loop through each Julia process for pid in $(pgrep julia) do echo "Killing Julia process with PID: $pid" sudo kill -9 "$pid" 2>/dev/null
# Check if the process was successfully killed if ps -p "$pid" > /dev/null then echo "Failed to kill process $pid. Retrying..." else echo "Process $pid successfully terminated." fi sleep 20 done done echo "All Julia processes terminated."
echo closing swap files sudo swapoff -a
# debug markers # mark=`date '+%m_%d__%H_%M_%S'`;mkdir -p /root/SWAP_B4_rootfs_${mark} /perm/REST_B4_perm_${mark} /data/SWAP_B4_data_${mark};sync
echo processing incomplete installations dpkg --configure -a --force-confdef
mkdir -p /run/chaipcr/ touch /run/chaipcr/exit_all.flag pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill julia;pkill realtime;pkill realtime
echo disable swapping free -m swapoff -a
umount /dev/mmcblk0p* umount /sdcard/*
swapoff -a umount /sdcard/* umount /dev/mmcblk0p*
if $is_dev then echo Building a debug image else echo Formatting disk!
LC_ALL=C /sbin/sfdisk --force -uS --Linux /dev/mmcblk0 <<-__EOF__ ,16777216,0x83,* ,,0x83,* __EOF__
/sbin/partprobe /dev/mmcblk0 /sbin/mkfs.ext4 -O ^metadata_csum,^64bit /dev/mmcblk0p1 -F /sbin/mkfs.ext4 -O ^metadata_csum,^64bit /dev/mmcblk0p2 -F
fi
mkdir -p /sdcard/factory || true if mount /dev/mmcblk0p1 /sdcard/factory/ then echo "temp sdcard folder mounted" else echo "Error mounting temp sdcard folder" exit 1 fi
# creating a temporary swap file on sdcard if fallocate -l 4G /sdcard/factory/swapfile #or dd if=/dev/zero of=/sdcard/factory/swapfile bs=10M count=300 then echo "swap file created successfully" else echo "failed creating swap file" exit 1 fi
sudo chmod 600 /sdcard/factory/swapfile sudo mkswap /sdcard/factory/swapfile sudo swapon /sdcard/factory/swapfile
#verifying swap file is successfully added sudo swapon -s
free -m apt autoremove -y -q du -h --max-depth=1 / df -h
exit 0
